episodes.title: The Shakahola Cult Massacre: Starving to Meet Jesus
episodes.description:
This video is for educational purposes.

From taxi driver to cult leader, Paul Mackenzie brainwashed thousands of followers to believe the end times were quickly approaching. The result closely resembles the Jonestown Massacre. Over 450 people, mostly women and children, starved and murdered in order to meet Jesus.

This video features materials protected by the Fair Use guidelines of Section 107 of the Copyright Act.
